1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Whoever performs ablution, let him clean his nose, and whoever uses pebbles to clean himself after defecating, let him use an odd number

chapter.eng-name: Going to extremes in sniffing water up into the nostrils and blowing it out
